insurance.title: Personal Property, Payment Card and Internet Threats Insurance
insurance.checkbox: I hereby declare that I have read and understood the contents of the Insurance Contract number MMPIP 1/2018 and the Terms and Conditions.
insurance.iddDetail: The legal documentation for your insurance will be delivered to you electronically. The original paper documents can be acquired at any MONETA Money Bank branch.
insurance.footer: Please, carefully read the information material for Personal Property Insurance, Payment Cards Insurance, and Internet Threat Insurance which states the exceptions and limits for coverage.

victory.title: Congratulations!
victory.detail: The insurance has been arranged successfully. You can find all your insurance in the My Insurance section of our app..

cancelIntro.title: Do you want to terminate your insurance:
cancelIntro.detail: Personal Property, Payment Card and Internet Threats Insurance
cancelIntro.footer: Your insurance will be terminated by {{date}}. Insurance premiums are charged per every month started..
cancelIntro.primaryButton: I understand and wish to terminate

sign.title: Sign the contract with your PIN number

cancelVictory.title: The insurance has been terminated
cancelVictory.detail: Your request to terminate insurance has been accepted for processing. Your insurance will be canceled by {{date}}. Thank you for using our services. You can always renew your insurance in Smart Banka.

cancelForOfferVictory.title: We have received the cancellation request
cancelForOfferVictory.detail: We have received the request to cancel the insurance. The insurance shall be canceled by {{date}}. You can now arrange new insurance.

cancelDisagree.title: We can’t continue without your permission.
cancelDisagree.detail: Should you have any questions regarding your contract, do not hesitate to contact us. We are happy to help.

disagree.title: We can’t continue without your permission.
